channel.title: SMTP server
channel.description:
alright I have it set up and im getting no errors at all. Im using my ISP's server aswell and I am using wamp5. Anyways my problem is that it the person who requested the email to be sent to them is never sent or they never recieve it.
[code][mail function] SMTP = smtp-server.sc.rr.com ; for Win32 only smtp_port = 25 sendmail_from= billygotshot@gmail.com ; for Win32 only [/code]
i really dont understand why it is not working. I have also tried using other programs to do it but they do the same thing =\
